devdoc.author: rube-de
devdoc.details: Only the contract owner or the BrokerbotRegistry contract can add tokens to the registry.

TokenRegistry__Unauthorized().details: Error thrown when an unauthorized address tries to add a share token

params.adr: The new address of the BrokerbotRegistry contract
The address of the added share token
The address of the removed share token
The address of the share token to be added

returns._0: bool True if the token was added successfully, false otherwise
uint256 The number of share tokens in the registry
bool True if the address is a share token, false otherwise

params._brokerbotRegistry: The address of the BrokerbotRegistry contract
params._owner: The address of the contract owner

returns._0: address[] An array of share token addresses

params.adr: The address of the share token to be removed

returns._0: bool True if the token was removed successfully, false otherwise

params._brokerbotRegistry: The new address of the BrokerbotRegistry contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: TokenRegistry

BrokerbotRegistryUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the BrokerbotRegistry address is updated

ShareTokenAdded(address).notice: Emitted when a new share token is added to the registry

ShareTokenRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when a share token is removed from the registry

addShareToken(address).notice: Adds a new share token to the registry

amountOfShareToken().notice: Returns the number of share tokens in the registry

cointainsShareToken(address).notice: Checks if a given address is a share token in the registry

constructor.notice: Constructor to set the contract owner and BrokerbotRegistry address

getAllShareToken().notice: Returns an array of all share token addresses in the registry

removeShareToken(address).notice: Removes a share token from the registry

userdoc.notice: This contract manages a registry of share tokens and allows adding/removing tokens from the registry.
